'''Phantom Realm: Temple of the Star Latitudes''' is a part of the [[Summertime Odyssey]] event. It is unlocked after completing [[Summertime Odyssey: V]] and takes place in the [[Temple of the Star Latitudes]] domain.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Temple of the Star Latitudes 1.png
|text1  = The temple dome in "Temple of the Star Latitudes" will display key astrological signs. Each of these stars corresponds to one of the mechanisms on the ground in the temple. Find the brightest star and activate the mechanism that corresponds to it, and you will perhaps be able to solve the puzzle.
|image2 = Tutorial Temple of the Star Latitudes 2.png
|text2  = During combat, activating the mechanism that corresponds to the bright star(s) will activate Astral Harmonics, which will randomly provide a buff:<br />Subduing Star: Imprisons all opponents currently on the field and increases the DMG they take by 35% for 8s.<br />Collapsing Star: When a character collides with an opponent, the latter will immediately be defeated. Lasts 6s.<br />Tidal Star: Applies Hydro to all characters and opponents currently on the field. All Frozen opponents will take 50% more DMG for 8s.
}}
